The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.
programme.desc: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay

programme.title: The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.
The Barbababies want to invent like Leonardo da Vinci. // The Barbababies must choose between going to the pool or going for a bike ride.
programme.desc: Innovation Melting Pot / Make Up Your Mind Barbazoo

programme.title: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero

programme.title: When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash. // Rubble & Crew decide to go big when Grocer Gabriel wants something special built outside of his grocery store.
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel

programme.title: After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game of Hide-and-Seek to find Map.
programme.desc: The Great Abuela Cookoff / Missing Map

programme.title: Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up. // Chef and Olly have their hands full babysitting twelve ladybug babies and trying to make them a snack at the same time.
Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.
When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.
When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.
When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down.
Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.
Humdinger, Sid, and Sweetie have joined forces to try and take over the Lookout.
When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town.
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew!

programme.title: Mayor Greatway asks Rubble & Crew to build something special for her friend Mr. Ducky-Doo. But soon a construction mystery is afoot... // Rubble & Crew work to build a rain tank for Farmer Zoe before a storm, until a chicken complication crops up.
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Mr. Ducky-Doo A Special Diving Board / The Crew Builds A Rainwater Tank

programme.title: Boots wants to enjoy Banana Fest, but the Guava Geyser is erupting! Dora needs to stop the geyser and save the festival. / It's Picture Day, but the Grumpy Old Troll runs away! Dora follows him into Troll World to get him to come out for the picture.
programme.desc: The Floor Is Guava / We Are The Grumples

programme.title: Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday

programme.title: The hamsters are convinced that Harry's royal-themed birthday party is a front for a full-on Hamsterdale invasion. // When Lil Pal's favorite toy falls into the A/C vent, Mondo embarks on a journey to retrieve it.
programme.desc: The Dragon Egg of Surprise / Cave of Coldness

programme.title: Blaze, AJ, and Darington are in the front row for the amazing Chicken Circus! But when Crusher accidentally launches the chickens far, far away, it's up to Blaze and Darington to get their feathered friends back to the big top!
When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!
Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck.
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery

programme.title: Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

When Digi & Tal's space vacuum breaks it's up to the pups to save Mayor Humdinger from falling space debris. // Humdinger's Cuckoo Clock goes out of control. Ryder and the Pups must rescue Travis and get control of the Cuckoo to save Humdinger.
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Falling Space Junk / Pups Stop the Giant Cuckoo

programme.title: Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge.
programme.desc: Pups Save A Teeny Tiny Penguin

programme.title: Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback! / Motor and Lily make a shiny discovery worth celebrating... with the coolest light show the pups have ever seen!
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hair Salon / The Crew Builds A Colorful Crystal Show

programme.title: Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show

programme.title: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.
programme.desc: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut

programme.title: When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.
When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.
Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.
Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.
When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!
Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.
Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.
It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.
Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.
The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy
Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild

programme.title: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero

programme.title: When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!
Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck.
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery

programme.title: Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot

programme.title: Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark

programme.title: Barbidur and Barbalala become little rebels. // But who are the Barbapapa?
While Riggs tries to find a connection with his father, Murtaugh gives his daughter driving lessons, and the team faces a dangerous incident that tests their trust.
When a dangerous criminal from Lance's past (MICHAEL EKLUND) escapes from prison, Felicity offers herself up as bait so Arrow, Diggle and Lance can capture him...but plans go awry.

Kevin and Brooke search for the ultimate lipstick hack, explore beeswax as a waterproofing technique, and welcome an old tire into the All-Star Club. Plus, this week's "Hack Master" will go to the extreme by hacking Kevin's brain.

Kevin and Brooke put the best shaving hacks to the test in the ultimate beard-off, and find out if using a drill to eat corn is hack or wack. Plus, they'll welcome toothpaste into the All-Star Club and use pencil lead to make a light bulb.
The team crosses paths with a businessman who may have been the intended target. Deputy Inspector Haywood tries to help a troubled teen. Killian is at odds with his girlfriend.
Still in Hawaii, Sean takes the bidders deep into the island to hidden storage bunkers. Conflict arises between the locals and Sean's usual's, but who will be victorious?

Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. In the season finale, the guys toy with customers at a candy store using bizarre party props, they all try their hands at nosing, and they break the rules of appropriate elevator etiquette.

When Sheldon is forced to take a vacation by the university, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab.
Angry that Rachel interfered in her relationship with Ross, Jill sets out to seduce him.

This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earth’s very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the program’s malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

Explore hacks for all ages, from staying clean while eating ribs, to staying young in your golden years. Plus, watch hacks for making soap and hanging shelves, and get ready to welcome the twist tie to the All Star Club.

Brooke and Kevin discover the best hacks for stretching out shoes and removing coffee stains. Plus, they'll welcome hangers into the All Star Club, explore the most delicious hack from history, and meet the newest Hack Hero.

Put Thomas Edison to shame with 20 of the World's Smartest Inventions - from a bird feeder with a shocking high-voltage surprise, to a bowl made entirely of bacon, and a whacky way to grow bananas at home. With innovative commentary from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold.

Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!
The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!
A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.
A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.
Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.
A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.
A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

The death of a US submariner during an AUKUS ceremony in Sydney is investigated in a joint effort between NCIS Agents Afloat and the Australian Federal Police, and NCIS: Sydney is born.
The finals return to Las Vegas, where the ninjas face up to eight super-sized obstacles.
Jenny and Donovan help a young girl who seeks the truth about her father’s death.

Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. James Glenday and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Gemma Veness for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

The leading news at lunchtime. Melissa Mackay brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

A daily wrap of everything you need to know in politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to experts on issues driving the news cycle ahead of the May 3 Election.

Pop-singer Chipmunks Alvin, Simon and Theodore turn a songwriter's life upside-down.

A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.
A scientist tries to solve world hunger only to see things go awry as food falls from the sky in abundance.
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs

programme.title: Academy Award®-winner Charlize Theron stars as Aeon Flux, the underground operative fighting totalitarian rule in 25th-century Earth’s last living city.

A daring yet reckless pilot who shuns teamwork and the rules of engagement eventually learns the importance of cooperation and discipline. Along the way he has a fiery affair, does some spectacular flying and causes the death of his best friend.

Though no one else takes his job seriously, Paul considers himself on the front lines of safety. When a heist shuts down the megaplex, Jersey's most formidable mall cop will have to become a real cop to save the day.

In December 1935, when his transcontinental luxury train is stranded by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before, with a multitude of suspects.

Jake Vig is a con man with a gift for duplicity and a natural charm. Now he’s cooked up the con of a lifetime to even the score for the murder of a buddy, pay back those he owes, and get the hell out of the business while he’s still drawing breath.

Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A…

No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

When Roy, Lia and their daughter are attacked by an evil spirit at home, Lia sacrifices herself to save their lives. A year later, Roy arranges a spiritualist to protect their home and keep them safe from evil. As Good Friday approaches though, more haunted and terrifying events happen in their house. Can they finally overcome the evil spirit?

Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

Can they finally overcome the evil spirit?

Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?
Follow the Royal Malaysian Police as they go in pursuit of sinister Nigerian gangs who deceive or coerce hundreds of Malaysian women into smuggling drugs.

In Tulsa, a young mother is gunned down at a convenience store by a shotgun-toting assailant. In Kansas City, a local businessman is executed and Detective Jason Sutton looks to his employees for a motive.
When her family's gifts go missing, Stacy Ferrance blames the kids, but a dirty footprint leads to a shocking surprise in the attic.
Vickie Martin's ex has invaded her home and turned her life into a living hell. When Paul Mohlman investigates noises, he sees an eye looking up through a hole in the floor and discovers a meth lab.
Feisty Chiquita Tate grew up determined to make something of herself after being raised in poverty by a drug-addicted mom. Now a hard-working lawyer, the only thing missing in her life is a man.
After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

Murders are rare in tranquil Delta Township. So when a well-liked couple is gunned down in their home, residents are terrified — until police discover the monster accidentally left a trail of breadcrumbs.
The largest arms heist in Malaysian history soon turns into a 5-day hostage stand-off when Special Branch officers sent to investigate are captured, tortured and killed.
programme.desc: Al Maunah: The Malaysian Arms Heist

programme.title: A man finds himself in jail over stolen blueberries, and a woman who has spent her life running from the law decides to surrender in hopes of making amends with her son.
Follow the Royal Malaysian Police as they go in pursuit of sinister Nigerian gangs who deceive or coerce hundreds of Malaysian women into smuggling drugs.
When a man is gunned down while walking his dogs in a quiet park, surveillance video leads detectives to an unlikely suspect.
Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

With the help of digital forensics, authorities are able to debunk the alibi of one of the last people to see a 24-year-old missing jogger in rural Arkansas, making him the primary suspect in her murder.
Shayna Hubers takes the stand to defend herself after she brutally murdered her on-again, off-again boyfriend, Ryan Poston. She willingly takes the stand to prove her actions were in self-defense.

A man is arrested for driving his golf cart while intoxicated and refuses a breathalyser test. A young man with LSD and hashish learns the hard way that hanging with underage girls is a very bad idea.
When a young woman vanishes, detectives zero in on her controlling estranged husband—whose story continually changes in the interrogation room.
When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."
Iowa home-baker, Justina Rucinski, had just received the largest cookie request of her career. But when the customer arrived at Justina's house, she was brutally attacked and taken away at gunpoint.
In Derbyshire, England, a spirit sticks around the remains of a satanic ritual. A man in Stephan, South Dakota witnesses a shadow figure in an abandoned Native American high school.

Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.
These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.
These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.
Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.
These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.
These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.
These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.
These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.
These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.
These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.
Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.
These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.
These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.
These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.
Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).
International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.
Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.
International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.
Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.
The whole world, in French.

All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region.

The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

After three days in Tuktoyaktuk, Vincent and Nadia prepare to leave. But before they do, they allow themselves a last few adventures. It is also time to take stock: the explorers reflect on their favourite moments of their trip.

Eddy Bellegueule, born in 1992 in the Picardy village of Hallencourt, ''died'' age 21 under the pen of Édouard Louis. No longer Eddy, but not yet Édouard, the writer changes, transforms himself and reinvents his life. Amiens will be his stopover, between Hallencourt and the world. We discover his story.
The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.
The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.
A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.
The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.
1.3 billion of total sales of farming goods correspond to non-foodstuffs, such as for example flowers or Christmas trees. The whole sector is benefiting from the current trend to buy locally.

Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.
The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

After three days in Tuktoyaktuk, Vincent and Nadia prepare to leave. But before they do, they allow themselves a last few adventures. It is also time to take stock: the explorers reflect on their favourite moments of their trip.

A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region.

Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!
programme.desc: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !

programme.title: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.
Hatter's future is in Alix's hands! Without realising it, Big Boss has blown into a blow pipe and dusted Hatter with a magic powder that has sent him soundly to asleep.
1.3 billion of total sales of farming goods correspond to non-foodstuffs, such as for example flowers or Christmas trees. The whole sector is benefiting from the current trend to buy locally.

The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.
A general knowledge quiz.
Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.
All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

Max, a committed and persistent landscaper, has been working on a wild garden project in an impoverished district in Marseille. After years of refusal, his proposal reaches the final of an architecture contest.

To stave off boredom and make himself the centre of attention, Malik tells three local youngsters that he's leaving to live in the USA. It isn't true, but once the news has spread around the neighbourhood, he becomes a symbol of hope and pride for everyone.
Amra recently left her family to start her professional footballing career. But one weekend, she decides to go home out of worry for her grandparents' health.

Hélène admits that eleven years earlier, Marina had run away after surprising her with her lover. And that was when she was kidnapped. Superintendent Victoire Eberhart discovers that the man who has been pulling the strings since the beginning is none other than Paul, her lieutenant and Laurent's best friend.

In Ivan Claes' trunk, Laurent discovers a bloody towel and Marina's bracelet. He gives them to Paul for analysis, but the latter burns them. Laurent drags him into the forest, ready to kill him if he won't tell him where his daughter is buried. But Paul isn't the murderer...

Will hydrogen one day replace kerosene? Is ''carbon neutral'' flight really possible? Why is flying still cheaper than the train? We answer all these questions with Camille Mutrelle, from the NGO Transport et Environnement.

Arles amphitheatre is buzzing with excitement as the queen of the town is about to be named! But she doesn't come forward after her name is announced. A corpse is found instead of her in the royal carriage: the corpse of the election organiser.

Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.
International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.
Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.
International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.
Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.
The whole world, in French.
Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.
Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

Also known as the ''Black Mozart'', the Chevalier de Saint-George was one of the most brilliant figures of 18th century Europe. An extraordinary violinist, adored orchestral conductor, he composed several operas and a number of lyrical works before sinking back into oblivion. A look back at his career.

The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.
The televised news programme from TVMonaco.
All the news from RTS.
When the kids discover Myrtle has a shady past, they try to expose her before Pop Pop proposes. // Lynn and Liam butt heads when they're forced to partner up as the middle school hall monitors.

After chanting a spell to get in touch with her inner warrior, Blossom unknowingly takes Storm's warrior spirit. // Gargamel casts a spell over Grouchy which makes everything that he complains about appear inside his hovel.

Dreamer tries to become a knight, but his annoying antics make him some new enemies that land him in danger. // When Gargamel accidentally breathes in the pollen of a rare flower it instantly wipes his memory.

Patrick invents a new board game, and invites SpongeBob, Sandy and Squidward to play it with him. // After accidentally flushing Mr. Krabs’ safe, SpongeBob and Squidward must go into the sewers to find it.
SpongeBob gets a pair of long pants, but they change his life in unexpected ways. // When Larry the Lobster opens a new gym in Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob becomes his best customer.
SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap.
Luna needs to get rid of a nasty case of the hiccups before a big rock competition. // The Morticians Club plan Bertrand's escape from the cruise ship his parents work on.
Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car for a long, family, road trip.

Tensions run high when Lincoln and Clyde both get an internship at Flip's and compete to win the manager title. // When Lincoln sees how tame Pop Pop has gotten in his older age, he takes him out for a day to remember.
Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland.
The Patrick Show presents the "Roast of Patrick Star".
SpongeBob befriends a small storm cloud, but has to protect it from a crazed weather man.

Lincoln has a crush on Lynn's new best friend, Zia, and the only thing stopping him from asking her out is... Lynn. In a series of trials and tribulations, Lincoln tries to prove to Lynn that he's worthy of dating Zia.

After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.
When Danger Force becomes the newest exhibit at an Alien Zoo, Miles must find a way to break them out before they become alien dinner.
A villain’s 'dream beam' traps Henry in a crazy dream state that only Charlotte can rescue him from.
The East River 3 are on the verge of victory! The Turtles and Mutanimals must team up to stop them, but not everything is as it seems... what is the PEARL and why does Goldfin want it?
programme.desc: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: Rosa's family activity of birdwatching in the woods goes sour when Sergio gets mistaken for a rare species. // Tired of not having a space of his own, Bobby secretly moves into a vacant apartment unit in the building. Feat. Lori Loud
Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.
Ronnie Anne and Lincoln are set for a big day of pranks and newbie Sid wants to join in on the fun too!

Smurfette accidentally loses the Smurf Village in a bet and must carefully try to win it back. // When the Smurf Girls invite all the Smurfs to their Grand Equinox Ball, Gargamel and Azrael crash the party.
Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland.
The Patrick Show presents the "Roast of Patrick Star".
Plankton and Karen take dance lessons and quickly become the top of the class. // Equipped with a magical spell book, SpongeBob cooks up chaos in the Krusty Krab kitchen.
The origin of the woman called BISHOP! Why does she hate mutants? What is the secret of the Mechazoids? And exactly what happened the night the Turtles fell into Bishop's trap?
programme.desc: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: Convinced that their scrapbook isn't good enough for Dad's birthday, the Loud kids seek out the perfect gift. // Lily hears the parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters

Lucy faces off against her friend Haiku to become the new president of the Young Morticians' Club at school. // Leni is promoted to temporary manager at work, but she worries about remaining good friends with Miguel and Fiona.

After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe transform into them to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up.
After Volt and ShoutOut are kidnapped by Cyborg Rick Twitler, Henry Hart returns from Dystopia in an attempt to save his friends and stop the anti-internet cyborg for good.

Henry and the other kids destroy Ray's prized movie prop, The Theranos Boot. To replace it, Henry and Jasper travel to an alternate universe Man Cave using Bill Evil's inter-dimensional transporter and steal their Theranos Boot before Ray finds out.

Captain Man, sick of fighting the same old villains, is convinced to make a profile on a match making app for heroes and villains. Kid Danger agrees to do the same and two of them set up a double-fight to square off with some new villains.

Lincoln is going to his first rock concert, and Luna is determined to make it the greatest experience ever. // Lincoln finds a letter in the attic leading him to believe there is money hidden within the Loud house!
After Lola gets sick and can’t compete in her pageant, Lincoln coaches Lana to take her place. // Thinking it’ll be easy, Lincoln and Clyde take on the task of babysitting the youngest Loud, Lily.
When all 10 of Lincoln’s sisters ask him to cover for them on the same day, Lincoln has his hands full. // Bobby and Lori go on a double date with Lincoln and Bobby’s little sister, Ronnie Anne.
To save his brothers, Mikey needs the help of Bishop's intern, ROD. But Rod wants something in return... to be turned into a MUTANT! To save the day, Mikey has to become... RESPONSIBLE.
programme.desc: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!
Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!
Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.
GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

The Boo Crew vacations in the Bermuda Triangle while Dracula considers which Were-Ruler candidate to endorse. // Clawdeen investigates a destroyed sandcastle that could change the fate of the election and discovers surprises on the island.

When Draculaura and Heath find themselves in an alternate dimension where they're seven years old, Draculaura must confront her past. // Clawdeen is torn between spending time with the Boo Crew or her new friend Venus.

Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?
Rebecca offers advice to her peers and a superior that goes too far. Myles and Yasmine struggle to be partners until Charlie takes the lead with his advice.

Anika and Jennie try to get to the bottom of the mysterious VR headsets and make a disturbing discovery. Meanwhile, Oliver, Florian and Jasmyn are in for a shock of their own when they pay a visit to Florian's house.

Taylor and the gang discover a symbol that leads them on a treasure hunt all over Rock Island, resulting in an incredible discovery! Along the way they must protect their precious cake cargo - and deal with a menacing Raquel from the South Section.
Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.
Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.
Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L. // SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward on a plane to a tropical resort.
Squidward ventures to Nosferatu's castle after accidentally receiving his mail. // Nosferatu's minion Slappy kills some time around Bikini Bottom.
When Gargamel tries to transform into a Smurf, the Smurfs have to share their secrets to prove their identity.

When Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice, they invite him to the village for a party. // Farmer and Vanity unearth a chest which contains a magnificent gem that brings bad luck to anyone who touches it!
When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.
Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.
Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!
Nosferatu's minion Slappy kills some time around Bikini Bottom.
Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.
Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.
Lori struggles to make a good impression on Bobby's dad after accidentally pushing him into a puddle. // Desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school.

Leni and Carlota's working styles clash when they are both interning for a famous fashion designer, Mariella Moss. // The Louds book a stay at an all-inclusive resort, only to find the vacation is not what they imagined.

Musical set on the Jersey Shore where sea crab tourists clash with land crab townies.

Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the very best at the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious mind.
Strike and Robin fear their witness could be in danger and must act quickly.

Marlon Brando, Robert De Niro, Edward Norton and Angela Bassett lend some quality star power to this intriguing crime drama.
An HBO Original Movie, Life Support tells the tale of an HIV-positive woman who learns lessons of love and strength through helping others.
A wry comedy of adolescent angst and confusion, this HBO Original Movie traces a teenager’s journey of tackling the mysteries of life, love and public speaking.
Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse introduces Brooklyn teen Miles Morales, and the limitless possibilities of the Spider-Verse, where more than one can wear the mask.
A remake of the 1966 classic, this film is a humorous and touching tale of a womanizer who is forced to question his seemingly carefree existence.
The parents of a 35-year-old bachelor hire an expert to seduce him so that he can move out of their house.

This documentary highlights the effects of excess carbon on the Earth, and how some humans are innovating cutting-edge efforts to mitigate climate change.
An HBO Original movie about Physician Dr Jack Kevorkian, who endures trials following his invention of a suicide machine that helps the terminally ill die with dignity.
The historic struggle and the courageous fighting of The Tuskegee Airmen, the first African-American U.S. Army Air Corps combat fighter pilots in WWII.
This epic production with an original London cast and orchestra of more than 60 artists tells an inspiring tale of resilience and hope.
programme.desc: The Prince Of Egypt: The Musical

programme.title: In this HBO Original movie, two men achieve an enormous medical breakthrough that earns one an award and the other, a painful lesson in unequal opportunity.
Five years after the events of the first season, Joel and Ellie are drawn into conflict with each other and a world even more dangerous and unpredictable than the one they left behind.
A multi-generational love story set against the iconic backdrop of New York.
A clumsy criminal gets placed in a position where he has to save himself and his girlfriend from the Mafia.
Mrs. Eaves’ complicated history with the baby is revealed.
Natasha, Mrs. Eaves, and Bobbi try to take the baby as far from Barbara’s as they can – but the Jupiter House children have other plans.
A bank robber must navigate a dangerous series of complications to get out of the game.
A lone policeman must run for his life when he gets assigned to solve the murder of a Ku Klux Klan leader in a small southern town.
Given the opportunity to participate in a life or death reality game show, one man discovers there's a lot to live for.
Eric Bana is Bruce Banner, a tormented scientist whose temper periodically transforms him into a raging green monster.
This time, the Fockers and Byrnes brace themselves for the arrival of a baby.
In order to write a hit song and make a comeback, a washed-up '80s pop star must collaborate with his quirky plant lady who has a knack for lyrics.
After shattering the hunger games forever and rescued by the rebels, Katniss becomes The Mockingjay, the symbolic leader of the rebellion.

Chinese-American New Yorker Rachel Chu travels to Singapore with her boyfriend Nick to attend his best friend's wedding. Before long, his secret is out: Nick's family is wealthy, and he's considered the most eligible bachelor in Asia…

A rebellious student, a notoriously disliked professor, and the school’s head chef form an unlikely bond, as they are the only one’s left on-campus for Christmas break, helping one another understand that they are not beholden to their past.
Failing to defeat Aquaman previously, Black Manta, driven by the need to avenge his father's death, returns to take Aquaman down once and for all.
When a world war event occurs on Earth, nations contact their astronauts aboard the ISS and give them instructions to take control of the station.

New student Cady Heron is welcomed into the top of the social food chain by the elite group of popular girls called “The Plastics,” ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George in Tina Fey's new twist on the modern classic, MEAN GIRLS.
Three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Lydia's teenage daughter, Astrid, discovers the model of the town in the attic and the portal to the Afterlife is opened.

When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.
programme.desc: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil's Tattoo

programme.title: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?
A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.
Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.
When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.
After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.
After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.
A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.
After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.
An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.
Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.
Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.
As a social critique, ‘Cart’ tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.
A busker met a girl who makes decision through tossing a coin.
The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...
When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.
When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.
Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.
The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, they’re reminded that their differences make them unique.

When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.
After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.
Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Jealousy overtakes Puss when he suddenly feels like the third wheel after the Goodsword has an instant connection to El Guante Blanco.
programme.desc: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.
programme.desc: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety
When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course
When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

When Tag is left in charge of the Pawston Pawtomotive for the day, Frank and Beans open up a rival garage and take all the business. But when all the cars around Pawston break down because of Frank's shoddy mechanic work, Tag and Scooch have to go around town to fix all his mistakes. \ Scooch wants to be a Tail-kwondo master like his hero, Master Wag, but he can't break a biscuit with his tail. Tag helps train him (and his tail), and they even track down Master Wag who gives Scooch a good luck charm. But when Scooch loses the good luck charm before his tail-kwondo test, he needs to find a way to believe in himself.

When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.
When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.
When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny

programme.title: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.
Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.
The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.
When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.
George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge
programme.desc: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.
When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

When passengers on a train are attacked by a creature, they must band together in order to survive until morning.
After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.
Story of a pimp who became a member of a revolutionary group after saving its leader
The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt of his mother to convince his billionaire grandfather to pay the ransom.
programme.desc: All The Money In The World

programme.title: An Ex intelligence agent is tasked with safely transporting Seo Bok, the first ever human clone, who holds the secret of eternal life
Three grave robbers explore a lost underground kingdom to find a powerful charm.
When a young man is executed for committing murder, he leaves behind a curse letter, promising vengeance for all those connected to his unfair trial.
Three successful Hong Kong lawyers are hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when their employer's motives become clear.
After Christopher Robin abandons them for college, Pooh and Piglet embark on a bloody rampage as they search for a new source of food.
programme.desc: Winnie The Pooh: Blood And Honey

programme.title: A group of women who form a cheerleading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'
When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, A girl will risk everything to protect the people she cares most about.
Unseasonably cold summer weather causes difficulties for several animals in the Yorkshire Dales and North York Moors, including an injured roe deer and her twins.
programme.desc: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.
programme.desc: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.
programme.desc: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

At an amusement arcade, Teddy accidentally gets put in a claw machine as a prize!

Gumball has misunderstood about his date with Penny: he thought they were meeting for dinner, but they were actually meeting for lunch at a Diner called 'Dinner'. He runs to the mall but everyone he meets on the way seems to misunderstand him in a different way. Once he finally gets to the mall it seems all his misunderstandings have caught up with him.

Beast Boy and the Giant Elephant Man smash into the local LexMart superstore during the shift of Teen-Titan-super-fan, Mickie. Mickie and her manager inform Beast Boy that even though he's a superhero “you break it, you buy it”.
Killer Moth’s carefully planned out mission to track down a mysterious Scientist and his briefcase, is going well and is about to make his escape when Beast Boy shows up!

Beast Boy is new in town and hoping to make a good impression on the citizens of San Pérez with his new identity The Lone Wolf! And by taking out his first adversary the amphibious terror Mister Toad!
Beast Boy and Cyborg try their best to slow the pizza delivery boy so they can get free pizza.
When Aqualad and Raven fall for each other, Beast Boy fights this match - with intensity.
When the Amoeba Boys wreak havoc on the Internet, Bubbles has to hack her sisters in to stop them.
Finn and Jake have creative differences while making the best home movie ever!

Ben is tasked with cleaning the Rust Bucket, but when he is tricked into letting the villainous and vile Fly Guys steal it, he must chase them down before they create an unstoppable maggot monster with sights firmly set on destroying Las Vegas.
Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.
Daffy and Porky Pig ride through the jungle searching for treasures.
The Lemmings decide to shelter a crab from a seagull but soon, Grizzy sees it as a threat to his peaceful day.
programme.desc: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour

programme.title: Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy.
At last, it’s Team Persona’s battle against Team Pendragon at the top of The X.
Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!
Buttercup joins Jemmica in a quest for adventure, but how far will she go?

Clarence and Sumo hit the jackpot when they get suspended for a week, learning all sorts of different facts they¿d never learn in class, but after a few days the suspension takes its toll, boredom sets in and the boys want to go back.

When the Amoeba Boys wreak havoc on the Internet, Bubbles has to hack her sisters in to stop them.
Finn and Jake have creative differences while making the best home movie ever!

When Ben interferes with malicious magician Hex's quest for the earth-moving Titan Gloves at a flea market, he inadvertently switches bodies with Gwen forcing him to walk a mile in her shoes and vice-versa!

In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.
Sylvester thought he saw a ghost
Rivals Buster and Plucky decide to throw an epic pizza party and are shocked to find out they’re actually getting along while Babs and Sweetie get into their first roommate disagreement.

After Gumball convinces himself that Penny doesn't love him as much as she used to, he decides to put together a romantic quest to remind her of all the good times they've had together. But Gumball's romantic gesture backfires, landing Penny - and maybe their relationship - in serious peril.

When Clarence is asked out on a date by Ashley, a girl in his class, he realizes he doesn't know the first thing about having a girlfriend! Clarence enlists Sumo and Jeff to transform himself into the perfect gentleman, just in time for his big date.
When Robin starts doing power moves with Cyborg, Beast Boy gets very jealous.
Mike and his friends receive a tip from the Justice Boosters and visit Grandma Cubbenson. There, they encounter Papa Princess, a member of the Council of Comics, and engage in battle.

At the dentist's office, Ben grows uneasy over the dentist's odd behavior and goes into hiding. But when his suspicions prove right, and the dentist transforms into the monstrous Toothache, Ben must save the day!
After a memorial for a fallen ally, Jake starts acting very strange.
Steven helps Mayor Dewey run a difficult campaign.
When Mordecai and Rigby order T-shirts for their non-existent band (Mordecai and the Rigbys), Margaret mistakes them for actual musicians.
When Mung ruins his tongue, he must rely on Chowder as his taster.
Duck brothers from outer space kidnap Muriel. They've come to Nowhere to rescue another brother. Courage must save Muriel and ends up helping the brothers as well.

Rigby steals a magic keyboard from a preoccupied sorcerer. When Mordecai and Rigby accidentally make a hole in the wall while wrestling a stuffed animal, they use the keyboard to make Pops and Benson give them raises to try to pay for it.
When the catering company is robbed, the gang cooks up a reliable guard dog to keep it safe.
A lonely goose god looks down from the heavens, and spying Muriel, decides she must be his queen. He descends to woo her and carry her off, and Courage must find a way to prevent it.

The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When "Happy Birthday" rings out, the "surpriiiiiise" is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any cost.
Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear he's enamored with.
Mr Bean builds an alarm clock to wake him up in time for a comet fly-by
